channel.title: [317 Development Team] - Armadyl Pkz
channel.description:
[size=28pt][b]NOTE - IF YOU ARE A BEGINNER IN THE POSITION YOU WANT TO TAKE, DON'T EVEN BOTHER POSTING. YOU WILL NOT BE ACCEPTED[/b][/size] [b]Please use correct grammar and spelling when posting.[/b]
[size=18pt][b]Team - Will be updated.[/b][/size] Owner, Hoster & Primary Server Coder: Getstabbed Co Owner & Forums Coder: Nd01 Mysql Technicians: Empty Secondry Server Coders: Forddog Client Coders: Forddog Graphics Team: Empty
[size=18pt][b]Application Format - Follow or you will be declined[/b][/size] Name: (Optional) How old are you: (Optional) What position you would like to take: How long have you been doing this position: Have are your details for the following; MSN, Skype, Xfire. You need at least one of these: Feel free to post pictures/code extracts. They may help your application.
[b][size=18pt][u]Goals[/u][/size][/b] The project will involve creation of a website as realistic to the current Runescape one as possible. Currently, the forums are simple and use SMF. I'd like to create a webclient, registration via website, proper Runescape-like forums and have Highscores on this website. It would take a while to complete, but that in its self would be a huge success. Next I'd like to make the server as realistic as possible. This would involve a very stable economy (Much more than a regular RSPS. More like Runescape, but still not too hard to make money) The economy is the easy part, but then we need to graphically enhance it. This would most likely mean moving to a more modern deob. A 317 would be easier to code, but if need be, we could swap to something like a 602 server.
The following are screenshots of the server so far.
Chaos elemental - Hits normal and I believe it has drops. If it doesn't have drops, we need to give it good items. [url=http://img51.imageshack.us/i/chaoselementalf.png/][img]http://img51.imageshack.us/img51/2677/chaoselementalf.png[/img][/url] Godwars has all 4 bosses and sub-bosses in each chamber. The area before GWD needs a 20 kill count in order to enter. I'm thinking of making this so you have a counter at the top saying how many individual god kills you have (eg. 20 aviansies = 20 armadyl kills) [url=http://img687.imageshack.us/i/godwars.png/][img]http://img687.imageshack.us/img687/7237/godwars.png[/img][/url] A few minigames - Includes duel arena which could be worked on. [url=http://img64.imageshack.us/i/minigames.png/][img]http://img64.imageshack.us/img64/9448/minigames.png[/img][/url] Quick chat - tells players your level when one of the skills is clicked. [url=http://img821.imageshack.us/i/quickchatsystem.png/][img]http://img821.imageshack.us/img821/1484/quickchatsystem.png[/img][/url] Thieving gives items which can be sold for money. This makes things more interesting. [url=http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/4500/stallsb.png]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/4500/stallsb.png[/url] (for some reason it wouldn't let me add this picture, so I just put the link on instead)[/b]

item.title: [317 Development Team] - Armadyl Pkz
item.dc:creator: @getstabbed getstabbed
item.description:
@getstabbed wrote:

Wuf, I need to add you on MSN, Xfire or Skype before I can accept you.
Amaarzzz, added you on MSN.
Sorry I haven’t replied in a few days, been busy.

Read full topic

item.title: [317 Development Team] - Armadyl Pkz
item.dc:creator: @amaarzzz amaarzzz
item.description:
@amaarzzz wrote:

Name: Liam
How old are you: 16
What position you would like to take: Gfx designer or coder
How long have you been doing this position: gfx for 1 year and coding for 2 years
Feel free to post pictures/code extracts. They may help your application. im in middle of making something will post when finished

contact my msn: liamflan06@hotmail.co.uk

Thank’s

Read full topic

item.title: [317 Development Team] - Armadyl Pkz
item.dc:creator: @Wuf Wuf
item.description:
@Wuf wrote:

Name: John

How old are you: (17)

What position you would like to take: Graphics Design

How long have you been doing this position: I’ve been working with photoshop for a couple of years , invested a fair amount of time and cash into learning the full potential of the program. Althought I have never personally worked for a ‘graphics team’ for a RSPS I feel I have the means to do a good job.

Feel free to post pictures/code extracts: Will add soon.

Read full topic

item.title: [317 Development Team] - Armadyl Pkz
item.dc:creator: @Rene_eats_waffl3z Rene eats waffl3z
item.description:
@Rene_eats_waffl3z wrote:

Mate, I can think of you that you want to be in a big project.
But seriously, if you did nothing yourself you won’t get far.
So please, make some development so far, Or don’t try.

Rene eats waffl3z.

Read full topic

item.title: [317 Development Team] - Armadyl Pkz
item.dc:creator: @getstabbed getstabbed
item.description:
@getstabbed wrote:

[size=28pt]NOTE - IF YOU ARE A BEGINNER IN THE POSITION YOU WANT TO TAKE, DON’T EVEN BOTHER POSTING. YOU WILL NOT BE ACCEPTED[/size]
Please use correct grammar and spelling when posting.

[size=18pt]Team - Will be updated.[/size]
Owner, Hoster & Primary Server Coder: Getstabbed
Co Owner & Forums Coder: Nd01
Mysql Technicians: Empty
Secondry Server Coders: Forddog
Client Coders: Forddog
Graphics Team: Empty

[size=18pt]Application Format - Follow or you will be declined[/size]
Name: (Optional)
How old are you: (Optional)
What position you would like to take:
How long have you been doing this position:
Have are your details for the following; MSN, Skype, Xfire. You need at least one of these:
Feel free to post pictures/code extracts. They may help your application.

[size=18pt]Goals[/size]
The project will involve creation of a website as realistic to the current Runescape one as possible. Currently, the forums are simple and use SMF. I’d like to create a webclient, registration via website, proper Runescape-like forums and have Highscores on this website.
It would take a while to complete, but that in its self would be a huge success.
Next I’d like to make the server as realistic as possible. This would involve a very stable economy (Much more than a regular RSPS. More like Runescape, but still not too hard to make money) The economy is the easy part, but then we need to graphically enhance it. This would most likely mean moving to a more modern deob. A 317 would be easier to code, but if need be, we could swap to something like a 602 server.

The following are screenshots of the server so far.

Chaos elemental - Hits normal and I believe it has drops. If it doesn’t have drops, we need to give it good items.

Godwars has all 4 bosses and sub-bosses in each chamber. The area before GWD needs a 20 kill count in order to enter. I’m thinking of making this so you have a counter at the top saying how many individual god kills you have (eg. 20 aviansies = 20 armadyl kills)

A few minigames - Includes duel arena which could be worked on.

Quick chat - tells players your level when one of the skills is clicked.

Thieving gives items which can be sold for money. This makes things more interesting.
http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/4500/stallsb.png (for some reason it wouldn’t let me add this picture, so I just put the link on instead)[/b]
